content: Hi! Is there a way to additional install components like rustfmt for testing nightly builds?
I think there's a flag? Not sure.
But most likely if you want to bisect tools this isn't the right tool, as updates to tools are bundles of commits rather than just one.
Well, at least, I would try git bisect in the tool' repository first

I try to do a bisect on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/69355. In the example is prost involved. Prost formates the generated code with rustfmt. I see no fast way to deactivate that formating feature.
But ok, if it is not possible to add rustfmt easely I will try to reduce the example a bit more to get maybe rid of prost.

Edit: Found a way to disable the fmt feature
